source_text: Solstice to receive KAL shares equivalent to $70,000 and retain a 1% Net Smelter Royalty (NSR).
additional_details: Solstice Minerals Limited (Solstice) receives the royalty. The royalty is retained by Solstice on a non-core Exploration Licence sold to Kalgoorlie Gold Mining Ltd (ASX: KAL), implying KAL would be the payer.
